SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2Clear: Clears all outputs on the 16x2 LCD display
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2HideCursor: Hides the cursor on its current position
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ReturnHome: Resets the cursor to its default position
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShiftLeft: Shifts the current position to the left by 1 position
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShiftRight: Shifts the current position to the right by 1 position
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShowCursor: Shows the cursor on its current position
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShowText: Shows a text on the 16x2 display
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShowText|param|text: The text that is supposed to be displayed
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShowText|param|x: The x position on the display from 0 (most left position) to 15 (most right position)
SBCLCD16x2.lcd16x2ShowText|param|y: The y position on the display from 0 (upper line) to 1 (lower line)
